name: ping
description: Checks if the bot is responsive

name: help
description: Shows the help menu

name: queue
description: Adds a song to the queue

name: play
description: Plays a song from the queue

name: view
description: View the current queue

name: skip
description: Skips the current song

name: reset
description: resets the player state, use this if the bot is stuck

name: remove
description: Removes a song from the queue

options.name: song_number
options.description: The number of the song to remove from the queue

name: topsongs
description: Queues the top 5 songs for an artist

options.name: artist
options.description: The artist to get the top songs for

name: volume
description: Sets the volume of the player

options.name: volume
options.description: The volume to set the player to, range is 0-150

name: pause
description: Pauses the current song

name: stop
description: Pauses the current song

name: resume
description: Resumes the current song

name: purge
description: Purges the queue

name: clear
description: Clears the queue but keeps the current song playing

name: shuffle
description: Shuffles the current queue

name: radio
description: Toggle radio mode - automatically queues similar songs when the queue is empty

name: loop
description: Toggle loop mode - repeats the current song

name: history
description: Shows recently played songs in this server

options.name: limit
options.description: Number of songs to show (default 10, max 25)

name: leaderboard
description: Shows the most played songs in this server

options.name: limit
options.description: Number of songs to show (default 10, max 25)

name: lyrics
description: Shows lyrics for the currently playing song

name: recommend
description: Let the AI DJ pick a song based on your listening history

name: favorite
description: Save the currently playing song to your favorites

name: favorites
description: View your saved favorite songs for this server

name: unfavorite
description: Remove a song from your favorites

options.name: song_number
options.description: The number of the song to remove (from /favorites list)
